hero.title: Digitize Your Pet Business

howToStart.title: Start Your Journey in 3 Easy Steps

benefits.title: Everything You Need to Manage Your Business
benefits.card1Desc: Daily sales, profit insights, and performance dashboards.
benefits.card2Desc: Stock alerts, batch tracking, and fast purchase records.
benefits.card3Desc: Roles, permissions, and branch-wise staff control.
benefits.card4Desc: Barcode, discounts, returns, and seamless billing.
benefits.card5Desc: Book services and manage schedules with reminders.
benefits.card6Desc: Track orders, delivery status, and customer history.

reports.title: Visualize Your Growth
reports.subtitle: Make data-driven decisions with real-time reporting. See exactly how your business is performing.
reports.kpiFootnote: Demo data. Your dashboard will show real metrics.

serviceSales.title: How Our Platform Increases Your Sales
serviceSales.statCallout: Service users buy 3x more on average

customerBenefits.title: Why Your Customers Will Love It
customerBenefits.item2Desc: Automated alerts for vaccinations and appointments.
customerBenefits.item3Desc: They feel safe choosing BPA approved businesses.
customerBenefits.item4Desc: All their pet's records in one secure place.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Pet Business Owners
testimonials.quote1: The dashboard gives me clear sales and appointment insights. Managing services is faster, and customers are happier.
testimonials.quote2: Inventory alerts and POS features saved us time. Now we track products, staff, and orders without confusion.
testimonials.quote3: Bookings are organized and repeat customers increased. The system feels simple, clean, and reliable.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is it difficult to set up my shop online?
faq.a1: No. Create your account, add your business details, and start using POS, inventory, and appointments in minutes.
faq.a2: You can create discounts and promotions to attract customers, track redemptions, and measure sales impact.
faq.q3: What are business reports and comments?
faq.a3: Reports show sales, inventory movement, and customer trends. Notes/comments help staff coordinate work consistently.
faq.a4: Support is available 24/7 via your owner panel support section. We also provide onboarding help for new businesses.

cta.title: Ready to Grow Your Pet Business?

producer.kycNotSubmitted: Your Producer KYC has not been submitted. Product/batch features are disabled until KYC is submitted.
producer.kycPending: Your KYC is under review. Product/batch features are disabled until verification is complete.
producer.kycRejected: Your KYC was rejected. Please resubmit with corrections.
producer.kycSuspended: Your Producer Org has been suspended. Contact support.
